mappings.message: Transaction nonce is too low. Please wait for previous transactions to be processed or reset your nonce.
Transaction nonce is too high. Please check your transaction history and use the correct nonce.
Replacement transaction gas price is too low. Please increase your gas price to replace the pending transaction.
Replacement transaction gas price is too low. Please increase your gas price to replace the pending transaction.
Transaction gas price is too low for current network conditions. Please increase your gas price.
Provided Ethereum address is invalid. Please check the address format and try again.
Transaction data is invalid. Please check the transaction parameters and try again.
Transaction execution was reverted. Please check the transaction details and try again.
Target smart contract does not exist at the specified address. Please verify the contract address.
Event not found in transaction logs. Please check the event signature and try again.
Operation not supported by the EVM or provider. Please check the operation and try again.
